body:
Version: 0.4
Resources:
  $App_Example_app:
    Type: QB::Application
    Properties:
      Name: Example app
      Description: 
      AppColor: '#72509a'
      Manager: manager@yourrealm.com
      TableOrder: []
      AppIcon: Application
      CurrencySymbol: $
      FiscalYearDesignation: Last
      FirstDayOfWeek: Sun
      DateFormat: MM-DD-YYYY
      FirstMonthOfFiscalYear: Jan
      CurrencySymbolPosition: Between
      NumberFormat:
        SeparatorStyle: CommaGroupingPeriodDecimal
        SeparatorPlaces: none
      DefaultViewMode: Auto
      HideNewUpdatedIcons: false
      DisableAllUsersSelection: false
      CanCopyApp: Admin
      CanExportData: Everyone
      Searchable: false
      RequireAppToken: true
      ShowPerformanceBar: false
      ShowPerformanceAnalyzer: false
      GlobalSearchExactMatch: false
      Utf8DataEncoding: false
      Timezone: Default
      Branding:
        AppHeader:
          HideQuickbaseStandardMenu: false
        AppFooter: {}
      RoleOrder:
        - !Ref
          Role: $Role_Viewer
        - !Ref
          Role: $Role_Participant
        - !Ref
          Role: $Role_Administrator
    Roles:
      $Role_Viewer:
        Type: QB::Application::Role
        Properties:
          Name: Viewer
          Description: 
          Default: false
          ManageUsers: false
          EditApp: false
          DisableAccess: false
          AppUI:
            HideSettings: false
            HideUsers: false
            HideFavorites: false
            HideSearch: false
            HideHelp: false
            HideTestAs: false
          TableUI:
            Global:
              HideInBar: false
              HideNewRecord: false
              HideGridEdit: false
              HideEmail: false
              HidePrint: false
              HideImportExport: false
              HideSaveSpreadsheet: false
              HideCreateCustomizeReport: false
              HidePersonalSettings: false
      $Role_Participant:
        Type: QB::Application::Role
        Properties:
          Name: Participant
          Description: 
          Default: true
          ManageUsers: true
          EditApp: false
          DisableAccess: false
          AppUI:
            HideSettings: false
            HideUsers: false
            HideFavorites: false
            HideSearch: false
            HideHelp: false
            HideTestAs: false
          TableUI:
            Global:
              HideInBar: false
              HideNewRecord: false
              HideGridEdit: false
              HideEmail: false
              HidePrint: false
              HideImportExport: false
              HideSaveSpreadsheet: false
              HideCreateCustomizeReport: false
              HidePersonalSettings: false
      $Role_Administrator:
        Type: QB::Application::Role
        Properties:
          Name: Administrator
          Description: 
          Default: false
          ManageUsers: true
          EditApp: true
          DisableAccess: false
          AppUI:
            HideSettings: false
            HideUsers: false
            HideFavorites: false
            HideSearch: false
            HideHelp: false
            HideTestAs: false
          TableUI:
            Global:
              HideInBar: false
              HideNewRecord: false
              HideGridEdit: false
              HideEmail: false
              HidePrint: false
              HideImportExport: false
              HideSaveSpreadsheet: false
              HideCreateCustomizeReport: false
              HidePersonalSettings: false
